ModMetaData.name: Alpha Vehicles - Early Cars

ModMetaData.description:
Adds 8 early cars from 1885 to 1923. <size=24>Issues</size>
No issues tracked
<size=24>Plans for the future</size>
More vehicles? Maybe!
